messages.content: User message: Category tool_invocation, type ingest_file. Context: Zip these files: brief.txt, notes.md, summary.csv. Assistant reply: Got it. What is the missing detail you want me to use? User follow-up: Use a concise format and continue.
Flow status: awaiting_user_confirmation. If details are missing, share them; if a choice is needed, pick one; if all set, confirm.
